name: R0
extraInformation: The patch generated by an APR tool is identical to the developer's patch except for the diffs on format and comments.

name: R1
description: Different fields with the same value (or alias)

name: R2
extraInformation: The APR-generated patch has the same exception as the developer's patch, but does not specify the identical and concrete message.

name: R3
description: Variable initialization with new rather than a default value
extraInformation: The patch is generated by using a new initialized variable but not a default variable in the program, the two variables return the same value.

name: R4
description: if statement instead of a ternary operator
extraInformation: The APR patch is implemented by inserting new if statement but not a ternary operator to fix the bug.

name: R5
extraInformation: All donor code of fixing a bug is rolled in a method, the patch unrolls the method but not invokes the method.
